rows.label: qev055101_MSG0001
rows.name:
I thank you for your help in Noctilum, human.
Without you, we would not have reached New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0002
rows.name:
I was just discussing plans for the future with my
people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Though "discussing plans" is an inaccurate and overly
human description of our action.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0004
rows.name:
We Orphe are not susceptible to differences in opinion.
This activity is merely a final verification for the sake
of...formality.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0005
rows.name:
Very true. We are the servants of the Ovah.
Disagreement is a practical impossibility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev055101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what the Ovah is.

rows.label: qev055101_JNK0020
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev055101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask why disagreement is impossible.

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0006
rows.name:
The Ovah is our reason for existence and the
incontrovertible will that guides us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0007
rows.name:
It is peace itself to my kind, and also the thread that
links us together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0008
rows.name:
In truth, it is somewhat difficult to express in words,
but we feel it quite viscerally within us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0009
rows.name:
We live in accordance to the dictates of the Ovah
within our bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0010
rows.name:
The Ovah exists among all of my kind,
and its will unites us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0011
rows.name:
It is difficult to express in words, but as we Orpheans
share a common will in the form of the Ovah,
we inevitably reach the same conclusions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0012
rows.name: Tell me, Kun'luarb—where are Sun'celeg and Kon'luarb?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0013
rows.name:
Gathering them here is your responsibility as our
leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0014
rows.name:
I did not see Sun'celeg here, so I sent Kon'luarb out to
meet him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0015
rows.name:
Yet the probability of him arriving tardy was a scant
6.4 percent. I hope no trouble has befallen him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0016
rows.name: Kun'luarb! We have a problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0017
rows.name:
I was searching for Sun'celeg, and along the way found
evidence of a Definian infiltration here in New LA![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0018
rows.name: Definians? Are they why Sun'celeg has not arrived?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_JNK0030
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev055101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask for more information on the Definians.

rows.label: qev055101_JNK0040
rows.name: Assist

rows.label: qev055101_SEL0041
rows.name: Offer to help the clearly troubled Orpheans.

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0019
rows.name:
They are a covert force working under the Ganglion.
Their ability to assume the forms of other creatures
makes them excellently suited for infiltration missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0020
rows.name:
It would be a rather simple matter, for instance,
for one of their number to take the guise of a human
and enter this city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0021
rows.name: If they have entered New LA and Sun'celeg is missing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0022
rows.name:
It is premature to draw conclusions,
but he may well be in serious danger.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0023
rows.name:
Human BLADE, will you accept a formal request to
locate Sun'celeg?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0024
rows.name:
Please lend us your strength. If the Definians are
involved, it is meaningless to search for him ourselves.
Only death would await us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Thank you. If you would please present your
communications device, I will formalize our contract.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0026
rows.name:
We have an agreement, then. Kon'luarb, please share
all the pertinent information you have with this human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0027
rows.name: I last saw Sun'celeg on the residential-district elevator.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0028
rows.name:
I watched him take it up on his way to the Ma-non
ship, then returned to the residential district
myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0029
rows.name:
Therefore, witnesses should have been present wherever
he went from there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0030
rows.name:
As a human yourself, gathering testimony from human
residents should be a simple task.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0031
rows.name: Please find where he was taken as quickly as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0032
rows.name:
Have you considered the matter of searching for
Sun'celeg?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0033
rows.name:
If you are willing, I ask you to present your
communications device so I may formalize our contract.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0034
rows.name:
We have an agreement, then. Kon'luarb, please share
all the pertinent information you have with this human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0035
rows.name: I last saw Sun'celeg on the residential-district elevator.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0036
rows.name:
I watched him take it up on his way to the Ma-non
ship, then returned to the residential district myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0037
rows.name:
Therefore, witnesses should have been present wherever
he went from there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0038
rows.name:
As a human yourself, gathering testimony from human
residents should be a simple task for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0039
rows.name: Please find where he was taken as quickly as possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0040
rows.name:
Countless deserters of the Ganglion have been
assassinated by the Definians over the years.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0041
rows.name:
It is through that ironclad promise of violent retribution
that their organization holds together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0042
rows.name:
Please hurry. Make use of Kon'luarb's information and
find Sun'celeg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0043
rows.name: Have you learned anything of Sun'celeg's whereabouts?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_JNK0050
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev055101_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Sun'barac that Sun'celeg is likely in Oblivia.

rows.label: qev055101_JNK0060
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev055101_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask if a "bug guy" could be Sun'celeg.

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0044
rows.name: Oblivia? Mmm. Troubling news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0045
rows.name:
It seems logical that a human might consider our forms
to be insectoid. So yes, this "bug guy" might very
well be Sun'celeg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0046
rows.name: ...Oblivia you say? That is troubling news.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0047
rows.name:
But it is good fortune he was not killed on the spot.
That seems to indicate they feel we are of enough use
to merit keeping alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0048
rows.name:
There may still be time to save Sun'celeg.
We will make preparations to travel to Oblivia at once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0049
rows.name:
It is best we hurry—the Ovah is quite restless.
I believe this to be a sign of larger things to come.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0050
rows.name:
You are especially attuned to the Ovah's nuanced
activity. Your concerns certainly merit consideration.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0051
rows.name:
I request that you travel on ahead and aid Sun'celeg
however you can, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0052
rows.name:
Whatever his condition, we will use the extent of our
knowledge to see him brought home safely—provided
he is alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_JNK0070
rows.name: Propose

rows.label: qev055101_SEL0071
rows.name: Suggest that traveling together makes the most sense.

rows.label: qev055101_JNK0080
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev055101_SEL0081
rows.name: Obey Sun'barac and head for Oblivia.

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0053
rows.name: It is true that traveling by ourselves bears a certain risk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0054
rows.name:
But every hour that passes takes with it another sliver of
the possibility that Sun'celeg is alive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0055
rows.name:
This is our conclusion given the sum of the
circumstances.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0056
rows.name:
Please make for Oblivia straightaway, and do not
worry about us. My kind can stay hidden from danger,
given the proper equipment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0057
rows.name:
Definians possess considerable combat prowess,
but I am confident you will be victorious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0058
rows.name: Now please make for Oblivia and aid Sun'celeg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0059
rows.name:
Provided we find him alive, we will bring him safely
home to New LA by whatever means necessary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0060
rows.name: Now please hurry to Oblivia and aid Sun'celeg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055101_MSG0061
rows.name:
His mastery of technology is critical to our prosperity
here on Mira.[ST:wait ]
